titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Wilderness Club was founded in 1912. The original aim of the club was to bring together hunters, nature photographers, natural scientists, and travelers for the purposes of protecting, preserving, and restoring wildlife. The club's mission, as stated in 1998, is "to promote the safeguarding of habitat and wilderness areas where rare and endangered species are at risk of becoming extinct and to support programs for conservation of these species."

scopecontent.p: These are records related to the Philadelphia chapter of the Wilderness Club, 1936 and 1979-1998. Materials include: invitations to dinners; programs for annual dinners that list members, officers, recipients of the Wilderness Club Medal, and the evening's speakers; correspondence regarding membership; and a 1936 menu from the Club's annual dinner.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia: Wilderness Club of Philadelphia papers, 1920-1982 (collection 598).
